summary: Made substantial progress completing Beauty Booking module implementation. Phase 2 (Admin Web) and Phase 3 (Vendor Web) are now fully complete. Created comprehensive admin dashboard with 10+ KPIs, complete CRUD views for all management sections, full vendor portal with booking management, calendar with drag-and-drop, subscription system, package/gift card/retail/loyalty management, finance reports, and badge status views. Also created customer web controllers and routes structure. Remaining: Customer web views, API standardization/extensions, Flutter integration, comprehensive testing, and documentation.
current_status: Phase 2 (Admin Web): 90% complete - only commission UI and some report views remaining. Phase 3 (Vendor Web): 100% complete - all vendor features implemented. Phase 4 (Customer Web): Structure created (routes/controllers) but views need to be built. Phase 5-7 (API/Flutter/Testing): Pending. Overall progress: ~50% of implementation complete.
